about_the_game:
Fifteen coats based on actual Yellowstone wolves: important, famous, or just cool.


You can choose any of these coats for your own wolf. They will also be eligible to appear on dispersal wolves and grown pups in any new game that you start after purchasing this DLC.

Learn more about these beautiful wolves in the WolfQuest Knowledge Base article: Yellowstone Wolf Coats (click the "Visit the Website" link on the right).

Founders Coats

Five coats from the wolves who repopulated Yellowstone during reintroduction in 1995-96:
  • 7F (Leopold Pack founder)
  • 42F aka Cinderella (Druid Peak leader)
  • 21M (Druid Pack Leader)
  • 9F (Rose Creek Pack founder)
  • 10m (Rose Creek Pack founder)

Hall of Fame

Five coats from wolves who became famous among the wolf-watchers and around the world:
  • The White Lady
  • 832F aka '06
  • 755M
  • 926F aka Spitfire
  • 302M aka Casanova

Cool Coats

Five coats that just look cool!
  • 192M aka The White Wolf of Yellowstone
  • 838M aka Big Blaze
  • Half Black
  • Small Dot
  • 831F

Preview the coats in the game's customization panel!

You can choose any of these coats for your own wolf. They will also be eligible to appear on dispersal wolves and grown pups in any new game that you start after purchasing this DLC.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

name: WolfQuest: Anniversary - Yellowstone Wolf Coat Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: WolfQuest: Anniversary - Yellowstone Wolf Coat Pack - $5.99

package_groups.title: Buy WolfQuest: Anniversary - Yellowstone Wolf Coat Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 630 Pro or similar (using "Basic" graphics mode)
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or Radeon 580
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
